2.9.3.en:

implemented simple sort mechanic for navigation
fixed import of views, which were inside a folder
fixed theme also applied in iframe
do not simply reuse widget ids when importing or copying views
implemented basic bulb widget as react widget
made script tags work in basic html widget

einfache art mechanik für navigation
fester import von ansichten, die in einem ordner waren

nicht einfach widget ids beim importieren oder kopieren von ansichten wiederverwenden

script-tags funktionieren im grundlegenden html widget

фиксированный импорт просмотров, которые были внутри папки

не просто повторно использовать виджет ids при импорте или копировании просмотров

сделано скриптовые теги работают в базовом html виджете

mecânica de tipo simples implementada para navegação

made script tags work in basic html widget

common.name: user files and images for vis-2
Control vis-2
common.desc: Write here browser instance ID to control or 'FFFFFFFF' to control all instances

common.name: Command for vis-2
common.desc: Writing this variable act as the trigger. Instance and data must be preset before 'command' will be written. 'changedView' will be signalled too

common.name: Data for control vis-2
common.desc: Used for: alert, changeView, dialog, popup, playSound, changedView
